alert.note: Alert for Maries (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:46PM CDT until August 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Maries County in central Missouri... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 244 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of St. Thomas, or 21 miles south of Jefferson City, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Maries County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
